reviewText: What a movie!  You'll laugh, you'll cry, you'll sigh ... and just when you think you've got it all figured out, it will flip around and do something else you didn't see coming.  NTR looks a bit unassuming for a leading man, but he is up to every challenge, and there are a lot of them in this Tollywood production.  Tamanna is beautiful and get to show some real acting chops as the story unfolds.  It's an action/comedy/romance/crime thriller/revenge story with some amazing songs and dancing thrown in.  This would be a great introduction to Tollywood films and will be enjoyable across multiple-watches.  If you like Bollywood films, give this one a shot as well.
